title: Auto booted from queue (counts as dodge)
body:
Anyone else have this issue? I just had it happen twice in a row. Sitting in Champion select with a team. Suddenly it tells me I have left the queue. I didn't click on anything though? Sitting with a 30 minute penalty now. Has happened a few times before, but never twice in a row like this.
Is this a known bug? Or am I doing something wrong somehow?

replies.body:
Yeah. It actually just happened again. 

3 times now I've noticed I was typing while it happened. Are there any hotkeys that boot yourself from a queue? Maybe I'm hitting it somehow?
I believe this very last time I was holding Shift+ something to type in capital letter.

My connection seems to be ok, can't find any issues there.
Will post in report a bug.

I've spotted this same issue a couple times lately, and if I'm understanding right, this is a preeeetty weird problem to have. So if I'm understanding correctly, you were *IN* a lobby choosing your champion when a "queue dodged" message popped up? This would mean that when you accepted the queue it just....never took you out of the queue for some reason, which then found you a second match. 

Checkup on your network settings as some basic troubleshooting using our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but I'd also like you to go ahead and post this over in Report A Bug as this might be something for the devs to look into as well.
